text: Procyonidae is a family of the order Carnivora. The Procyonids originally lived in the Americas. ==Taxonomy== * Family Procyonidae ** Subfamily Potosinae *** Genus Potos: Kinkajous **** Kinkajou, Potos flavus *** Genus Bassaricyon: Olingos **** Allen's Olingo, Bassaricyon alleni **** Beddard's Olingo, Bassaricyon beddardi **** Bushy-tailed Olingo or Gabbi's Olingo, Bassaricyon gabbii **** Harris's Olingo, Bassaricyon lasius **** Chiriqui Olingo, Bassaricyon pauli ** Subfamily Procyoninae *** Genus Procyon: Raccoons **** Crab-eating Raccoon, Procyon cancrivorus **** Tres Marias Raccoon, Procyon insularis **** Common Raccoon, Procyon lotor *** Genus Nasua: Coatis **** Coatimundi or Ringtailed Coati, Nasua nasua **** White-nosed Coati, Nasua narica **** Cozumel Island Coati, Nasua nelsoni *** Genus Nasuella: Mountain Coatis **** Mountain Coati, Nasuella olivacea *** Genus Bassariscus: Ringtails and Cacomistles **** Ringtail, Bassariscus astutus **** Cacomistle, Bassariscus sumichrasti ==Other websites==
title: Procyonidae
